rev.comment: /* Police violence at Occupy UC Davis */

On November 19, Katehi called for creation of a task force to review the incident and report their findings and recommendations within 90 days.<ref> {{cite news |newspaper= [[Los Angeles Times]] |title=UC Davis chief launches probe into pepper-spraying of Occupy protesters |url=http://www.latimes.com/news/local/la-me-occupy-uc-davis-20111120,0,2407596.story |first1=Paul |last1= Pringle | first2=Sam
On November 19, Katehi called for creation of a task force to review the incident and report their findings and recommendations within 90 days.<ref> {{cite news |newspaper= [[Los Angeles Times]] |title=UC Davis chief launches probe into pepper-spraying of Occupy protesters |url=http://www.latimes.com/news/local/la-me-occupy-uc-davis-20111120,0,2407596.story |first1=Paul |last1= Pringle | first2=Sam
| last2=Quinones | date= 19 November 2011 | accessdate = 21 Nobember 2011}}</ref><sup>,</sup><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.kcra.com/r/29813746/detail.html|title=Task Force Created To Review Pepper Spray Incident|publisher=KCRA-TV|accessdate=2011-11-19}}</ref> That same day, approximately 1000 students and supporters participated in a silent protest against the Chancellor. <ref>[http://www.dailykos.com/story/2011/11/20/1038428/-UC-Davis:-Speechless?via=blog_650155 UC Davis: Speechless ]</ref>
| last2=Quinones | date= 19 November 2011 | accessdate = 21 Nobember 2011}}</ref><sup>,</sup><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.kcra.com/r/29813746/detail.html|title=Task Force Created To Review Pepper Spray Incident|publisher=KCRA-TV|accessdate=2011-11-19}}</ref> That same day, approximately 1000 students and supporters participated in a silent protest against the Chancellor. <ref>[http://www.dailykos.com/story/2011/11/20/1038428/-UC-Davis:-Speechless?via=blog_650155 UC Davis: Speechless ]</ref>
  +   +
==November 28 General Strike==
  +
On November 21, the General Assembly of Occupy UC Davis voted (with 99.5% consensus) to stage a General Strike on Monday, November 28th.<ref>[http://www.occupyucdavis.org/ "Occupy UC Davis Calls for a General Strike"]</ref>
